texto: from IHS Not for Resale,2021-05-17.09:27:29 UTC ISO 9004:2018(E) ﻿ Table A.9 — Self-assessment of the detailed elements of 8.1 Maturity level Conclusion Subclause Level Itema YES Results/commentb 8.1.1 Processes are managed in an informal or ad hoc manner. Process 2 Key processes, such as those relating to customer management satisfaction and operations related to product and — General service, are managed. The effectiveness of the processes is individually measured, and acted upon. Interactions between processes are not well managed. 3 Processes and their interactions are managed as a system. Interaction conflicts between processes are identified and resolved in a systematic way. Processes
